oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-06-08 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from June 8, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Marty Robbins (host/performer), guest performers Lonzo & Oscar, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, the Jordanaires, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 922nd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: June Carter; Grant Turner; Lonzo & Oscar; Jordanaires; Del Wood; Marty Robbins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Marty Robbins introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Marty Robbins) -- Prince Albert commercial (Marty Robbins, June Carter) -- Prince Albert jingle (Grant Turner) -- Marty Robbins introduces Lonzo & Oscar -- Gone No. 2 (Lonzo & Oscar, Jordanaires) -- Marty Robbins introduces Del Wood -- Rockin' 88 (Del Wood) -- Marty Robbins talks -- White Sport Coat (Marty Robbins, Jordanaires) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Marty Robbins) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Station announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jordanaires (Musical group); Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Robbins, Marty; Lonzo and Oscar
